name: ilivetheretoo.com
overview:
www.ilivetheretoo.com the world’s first micro social networking site for apartment communities. Launched the company in early 2011 with our Chairman Bill Cleverly who was formerly the Chairman and CEO of Meritage Home Corp (MTH on the NYSE).

www.ilivetheretoo is a facebooklike platform, used like Craigslist, which generates revenue like Groupon. The only difference is unlike facebook we don’t allow you to “friend your friends”. We have a patent pending auto-friend feature that friends you with everyone in your community automatically (with the option to delete individuals at your own discretion). Unlike craigslist all of our profiles are verified by management so you have confidence in the posts being safe and authentic. And unlike Groupon our deals only come from merchants within a few miles of your home.

A few of our clients include: Greystar, Alliance Residential, Fairfield Residential, Weidner, Holland Residential, PB Bell, Pillar Communities, IPA Living, MC Companies, Scotia Group and Simply Better.
